mapper.sql: apply_id, apply_title, apply_comment, user_pid, apply_date, apply_end_date, approve_comment, approve_user_pid, apply_status
mapper.insert: insert into apply (apply_title, apply_comment, user_pid, apply_date, apply_end_date, approve_comment, approve_user_pid, apply_status) values (#{applyTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveUserPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update apply
apply_title = #{applyTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_comment = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pid = #{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_end_date = #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_comment = #{approveComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_user_pid = #{approveUserPid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update apply set apply_title = #{applyTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_comment = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pid = #{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_end_date = #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_comment = #{approveComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_user_pid = #{approveUserPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.*,u.* from apply a left join user u on a.user_pid = u.user_id where a.apply_end_date is null order by a.apply_id desc
select a.*,u.* from apply a left join user u on a.user_pid = u.user_id where a.apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select a.*,u.* from apply a left join user u on a.user_pid = u.user_id where user_pid=#{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by a.apply_id desc
